snippet: Under the new ownership of freight tycoon Jim Crane, General Manager Jeff Luhnow has traded established players for prospects as Houston seeks to recover from last season’s franchise-record 106 losses.
abstract: Houston Astros general manager Jeff Luhnow has traded established players for prospects as Houston, under the new ownership of freight tycoon Jim Crane, seeks to recover from last season’s franchise-record 106 losses.
lead_paragraph: Under the new ownership of freight tycoon Jim Crane, General Manager Jeff Luhnow has traded established players for prospects as Houston seeks to recover from last season’s franchise-record 106 losses.

headline.seo: Astros Get Hope and Youth From New Owner and New Approach
headline.main: Astros Begin Again, Starting With Youth and Hope
headline.print_headline: Astros Begin Again, Starting With Youth and Hope
